
num_trails (number of traildata lines)
traildata lines follows
Particle_index trail_R trail_G trail_B   (this is traildata line structure)
.
.
n (number of particles)
num_walls (number of particles which make walls,they have low velocity and high mass)
particle data lines follows
.
.
index of particles to track if any (each on seperate line)

Example:
1
3 255 255 255
7
0
